channel.title: Weather on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Weather on Juan Orozco

item.title: Lightning is cool
item.description: Last night we had a CRAZY storm.   HUGE.   I've noticed when we get storms, they come out of nowhere, pour down gallons of water, and then leave within minutes.   The only evidence of a storm is steam coming off the street.   Every now and then they'll throw a little lightning, but usually, just rain.
